POST /api/categories/.desc: creates and returns a new category

GET /api/categories/:id.desc: returns one category represented by its id

PUT /api/categories/:id.desc: changes a category, specified by its id, and returns the changed category

DELETE /api/categories/:id.desc: deletes a category, specified by its id, and returns the deleted category

POST /api/users/.desc: creates and returns a new user

GET /api/users/:id.desc: returns one user represented by its id

PUT /api/users/:id.desc: changes a user, specified by its id, and returns the changed user

DELETE /api/users/:id.desc: deletes a user, specified by its id, and returns the deleted user

POST /api/posts/.desc: creates and returns a new post
POST /api/posts/.requires: title [String], text [String], author [mongodb _id], categories [Array of mongodb _id]

GET /api/posts/:id.desc: returns one post represented by its id

PUT /api/posts/:id.desc: changes a post, specified by its id, and returns the changed post. If the post is changed to chose: True, then update all the bids on the post to reflect which bid was chosen

DELETE /api/posts/:id.desc: deletes a post, specified by its id, and returns the deleted post

POST /api/bids/.desc: creates and returns a new bid

GET /api/bids/:id.desc: returns one bid represented by its id

PUT /api/bids/:id.desc: changes a bid, specified by its id, and returns the changed bid

DELETE /api/bids/:id.desc: deletes a bid, specified by its id, and returns the deleted bid
